main event: On June 29, 1960, a witness observed a bright object in the sky above Wilmington, Massachusetts, which changed in size and color before disappearing at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes,The object appeared to be metallic as it approached closer,Estimated speed of the object was around 2000 mph or better,The witness noted the object went unnoticed until it made a quick 90-degree turn,The report suggests it may have been a balloon due to local balloon operations.
witness description: A self-employed plumbing and heating contractor in Wilmington
